body: hey everyone :D .i 've  a  problem with visualizing sun path  on the  building  after connecting   the  sun vector .on rhino  Nothing  appear .! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/XQT0xcoyGcfS957RR-yZHnUO7*6CgUdOE7XrmbSah8jm2TSP*nX*xi0-bqSPgiVUmXb8tJwoQQuUwsi-r6xGpaqHfdJxGE-p/prob.png)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/XQT0xcoyGceJvcVPrTAkWAkLiw8yaftTlTYw141KCQs5s10Ay*C6GFHcspfPUiHcl3vtWeMQZizwM1VriK0UsVMa76A6GGji/prob2.png)

replies.body:
Uploading the file is always helpful.

May i assume your units are mm? Else, why your grid size is 1000?

-A.
Dora! What's exactly the problem here? The sunpath is visible in your images. Are you talking about the scale of the sunpath?

I understood the problem is with the radiation since in the images it doesn't show. But maybe i'm wrong.

-A.
